fullplot: Three guys, all their lives, have been living in the shadow of bullies and are determined not to take it anymore. Now they must train with the help of Mel to take on the most offensive and meanest youth baseball teams.
plot: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.
title: The Benchwarmers

tomatoes.consensus: A gross-out comedy that is more sophomoric than funny, The Benchwarmers goes down swinging.
